lyrics:
9 contributorscity lights lyricsverse 1
its a long road and it gets windy

oh im tryna steer tryna take the lead
but i feel like the road is steering me
getting so lost like a castaway
feeling so crossed like a renegade
and im tryna call out in the big city
just a small voice and no ones listening to me

ohoh tell me where to go
tell me that you know just how bright i glow

youre the city lights

like a sore thumb that they dont know about

im the hero not the narrator
hercules battling conquering everything yeah
